short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expert 2D CAD application that comes with a range of tools for industrial design. Measure lengths and dimensions inside drawing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LibreCAD is just one of more than 230 applications available in the cloud on rollApp. Check out the full list at https://www.rollapp.com/apps.

PLEASE NOTE:
- Working with files requires creating account with rollApp and connecting cloud storage (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive or Box)
- Free rollApp account allows to access your files in read-only mode. Please, subscribe for rollApp Premium to be able to save files

LibreCAD is a fully comprehensive 2D CAD application that comes with a range of tools to create 2D drawings for industrial design. The application has an easy to use and customizable interface, allows using layers to create your drawing and offers the ability to quickly measure lengths and dimensions right inside the drawing.
